sentences.english: Now, why did she call it a Ghetto Burger?
sentences.chinese: 那为什么她管这家店叫做“贫民区汉堡店”呢？

sentences.english: Their slums are filled with desperatelypoor people who have fled worse poverty in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 那里的贫民区住满了不顾一切逃离最贫穷乡村的穷人。

sentences.english: A lot of those shanties were burned. A couple of men were killed.
sentences.chinese: 很多贫民区的房子被烧了，有几个人被杀了。

sentences.english: How do we avoid the suburban ghettoes created in Western towns?
sentences.chinese: 北京如何才能避免西方城市中出现的“贫民区”呢？

sentences.english: A girl stood outside a school in the Mukuru kwa Njenga slum in Nairobi, Kenya, Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 一名小女孩站在贫民区学校的墙外，内罗毕，肯尼亚。

sentences.english: At first, Baal Dan provided street children with clothes.
sentences.chinese: 起初，巴力丹为贫民区的儿童提供衣服。

sentences.english: In other words, just how much is a Ghetto Burger worth?
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，贫民区的汉堡店到底能值多少钱？

sentences.english: The landlords dishoused the inhabitants of the slums.
sentences.chinese: 房东们把贫民区居民们赶出了房子。

sentences.english: We shall try our best to remedy the conditions in the slum area.
sentences.chinese: 我们将尽全力来改善贫民区的状况。

sentences.english: Shanty-towns of unemployed men were now called"Hoovervilles".
sentences.chinese: 失业者居住的贫民区现在被称为“胡佛村”。

sentences.english: The bum was down and out on skid row.
sentences.chinese: 这个流浪汉是贫民区的一个失业者。

sentences.english: Here, a favela in Rio de Janeiro is transformed by dozens of images.
sentences.chinese: 几十幅图像改变了里约热内卢的贫民区形象。

sentences.english: Four brothers from Manhattan's East Side, they ruled the world of burlesque for decades.
sentences.chinese: 来自曼哈顿贫民区的四兄弟，统治了滑稽舞数十年。

sentences.english: Wilson appreciates Moynihan for shedding light on ghetto poverty.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊赞赏莫伊尼汉揭示了贫民区贫困的现象。

sentences.english: Many distinguished men have emerged from slums.
sentences.chinese: 很多名人都出身于贫民区。

sentences.english: In the third part of our series on Vietnam, we switch the focus to a slum area of Ho Chi Minh City.
sentences.chinese: 专题第三集，镜头来到越南胡志明市平新郡的贫民区。

definition: Manhattan borough of New York City
